intent_atoms.description: As a user of ISOInspector UI, I want metadata display patterns to use the FoundationUI DS.KeyValueRow component via a BoxMetadataRow wrapper so that all metadata rows are consistent, accessible, and testable.

All existing metadata displays in ParseTreeDetailView.swift, EncryptionSummary, and other views must be refactored to use BoxMetadataRow with correct layout, copyable behavior, and design system tokens.
BoxMetadataRow component must expose public properties: label, value, layout (horizontal/vertical), copyable (bool) and conform to AgentDescribable protocol.

Component must support dark mode adaptation, WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility, dynamic type scaling, minimum touch target sizes, high contrast, reduce motion, and provide appropriate VoiceOver labels and hints.

Unit tests covering initialization, layout, copyable behavior, content variations, real‑world ISO metadata scenarios, agent describable conformance, integration in VStack/ScrollView, accessibility, dark mode, design system tokens, snapshot/layout consistency, and performance must total 60+ tests with ≥90% coverage.

Showcase screen BoxMetadataRowScreen.swift must demonstrate all API variations, interactive controls for layout and copyable toggle, long text handling, real‑world ISO metadata examples, dark mode documentation, and accessibility features list.
The BoxMetadataRow component file must contain a single entity per file and be less than 400 lines in size.
All metadata display code must import FoundationUI and remove any deprecated metadataRow helper functions.
Wrap the existing DS.KeyValueRow from FoundationUI instead of creating a new custom component, leveraging design system tokens for typography, spacing, and color.
Use Test‑Driven Development (TDD) with 60+ unit tests to ensure quality and coverage before implementation.
Adopt XP and PDD practices: incremental refactoring, continuous integration, single entity per file, and no @todo puzzles left.

functional_units.name: BoxMetadataRow Component
functional_units.description: A SwiftUI view that wraps FoundationUI's DS.KeyValueRow to display metadata key-value pairs with optional copy-to-clipboard, horizontal/vertical layout, dark‑mode support and WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility.

functional_units.name: ParseTreeDetailView Metadata Refactor
functional_units.description: Updates ParseTreeDetailView to use BoxMetadataRow for all metadata rows, replacing Grid/GridRow patterns and adding copyable actions where needed.

functional_units.name: ComponentTestApp Showcase Screen
functional_units.description: An interactive screen in ComponentTestApp that demonstrates the BoxMetadataRow component with layout options, copyable toggle, real‑world ISO metadata examples, dark mode, and accessibility features.

functional_units.name: BoxMetadataRow Test Suite
functional_units.description: A comprehensive XCTest suite covering initialization, layout, copyability, content variations, real‑world metadata scenarios, agent describable conformance, integration, accessibility, dark mode, design system tokens, snapshot/layout consistency, and performance of the BoxMetadataRow component.

functional_units.name: Navigation Integration for Showcase
functional_units.description: Adds a new destination case (.boxMetadataRow) to ComponentTestApp's navigation enum and links it from the Components section, enabling users to navigate to the showcase screen.
